explains: n. 厌恶；憎恨；令人厌恶的事物

sentences.en: These six things doth the LORD hate: yea, seven are an abomination unto him.
sentences.cn: 耶和华所恨恶的有六样，连他心所憎恶的共有七样。

sentences.en: For the froward is abomination to the LORD: but his secret is with the righteous.
sentences.cn: 因为乖僻人为耶和华所憎恶。正直人为他所亲密。

sentences.en: Divers weights are an abomination unto the LORD; and a false balance is not good.
sentences.cn: 两样的法码，为耶和华所憎恶。诡诈的天平，也为不善。
